name: Teal (itch)
description:
You're teal, and you're trapped in a world of puzzles. So solve them. That's what the game is about.

This game is heavily inspired. Physics isn't real. Remain perseverant.

Designed and developed by Madeline Kahn
Music and additional sprites by Charlie Bruskotter

Teal Hint Guide is now available.

The OST is available on YouTube.
